Why_if.title: Why IF
Why_if.subtitle: Own your data, local your business

0.title: Local First
0.pain: Feel cloud content is slow and unable to ensure privacy?
0.solution:
With IF, all data is stored locally, supporting backup and recovery, and is ready to use right away.
There’s no need to worry about network unavailability or about your personal data being secretly used for AI training or shared with advertisers.

1.title: User First
1.pain: Worried that app providers sacrifice user experience for profit?
1.solution:
IF centers around localization to provide features, striving to deliver the best possible user experience.
Unlike large cloud-based products, which incur bulky team and server costs, we prioritize user benefits over commercial interests.

2.title: Keep It Simple Stupid
2.pain: Dislike All in One and the design style of cluttered in colors?
2.solution:
IF adopts a modular design for its features, avoiding the mental burden caused by an all-in-one approach.
It also employs an ultra-minimalist, paper-like design style, providing users with a visually stress-free experience to support long hours of immersive content creation.

0.title: Todo
0.desc:
Constant effort leads to success.
Track your daily actions with to-do lists and gain self-affirming energy with each completed task.

1.title: Note
1.desc:
Learning without reflection is a waste.
Built on the Markdown standard, what you see is what you get, allowing you to enjoy an immersive writing experience.

2.title: Pomo
2.desc:
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Use the Pomodoro technique to build small milestones and regain your focus.

3.title: Schedule
3.desc:
Greatness cannot be planned, but creation can.
Use the schedule to build your goals in the dimension of time, and it’s better to face change than without one.
